ðŸ“– Summary: This repository provides a Python program that sets a user-editable To-Do list as the Windows desktop wallpaper. It includes a UI for editing the To-Do list content and allows customization of font color, background color, and font size. The program utilizes a background image to enhance the visual appeal of the wallpaper.
